name: phone-management-system
description: Comprehensive phone management system with feature flags, dashboards, and monitoring

scripts.build:dev: bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.dev.json --define ENV_DEVELOPMENT:true --define FEAT_EXTENDED_LOGGING:true --define FEAT_MOCK_API:true src/index.ts --outdir dist/dev
scripts.build:prod-lite: bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --minify --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/prod-lite
scripts.build:prod-standard: bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_AUTO_HEAL:true --define FEAT_NOTIFICATIONS:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --define FEAT_BATCH_PROCESSING:true --minify --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/prod-standard
scripts.build:prod-premium: bun run scripts/build-validation.ts production-premium && bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_PREMIUM:true --define FEAT_AUTO_HEAL:true --define FEAT_NOTIFICATIONS:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --define FEAT_BATCH_PROCESSING:true --define FEAT_ADVANCED_MONITORING:true --define FEAT_EXTENDED_LOGGING:true --define FEAT_VALIDATION_STRICT:true --minify --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/prod-premium
scripts.build:test: bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.dev.json --define ENV_DEVELOPMENT:true --define FEAT_MOCK_API:true src/index.ts --outdir dist/test
scripts.build:audit: bun run scripts/build-validation.ts security-audit && bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.audit.json --define AUDIT_MODE:true --define FEAT_PREMIUM:true --define FEAT_AUTO_HEAL:true --define FEAT_NOTIFICATIONS:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --define FEAT_BATCH_PROCESSING:true --define FEAT_ADVANCED_MONITORING:true --define FEAT_EXTENDED_LOGGING:true --define FEAT_VALIDATION_STRICT:true --no-macros --debug src/index.ts --outdir dist/audit
scripts.build:compare: bun run build:prod-lite && bun run build:prod-standard && bun run build:prod-premium && bun run scripts/analyze-bundle.ts dist && ls -lh dist/prod-*
scripts.build:analyze: bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_PREMIUM:true --analyze src/index.ts
scripts.build:dce: bun run scripts/build-validation.ts production-lite && bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --minify --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/dce-optimized
scripts.build:pure: bun run scripts/build-validation.ts production-standard && bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.prod.json --define ENV_PRODUCTION:true --define FEAT_PREMIUM:true --define FEAT_AUTO_HEAL:true --define FEAT_NOTIFICATIONS:true --define FEAT_ENCRYPTION:true --define FEAT_BATCH_PROCESSING:true --minify --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/pure-optimized
scripts.build:security: bun run scripts/build-validation.ts security-audit && bun build --tsconfig-override configs/tsconfig.audit.json --define AUDIT_MODE:true --define SECURITY_VALIDATION:true --no-macros --drop=console --jsx-side-effects src/index.ts --outdir dist/security
scripts.test:mobile: bun test --config tests/config/bun-test.config.ts --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 14_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15" tests/integration/api/
scripts.test:desktop: bun test --config tests/config/bun-test.config.ts --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36" tests/integration/api/
